sentences.en: A belief in God, and trust in his providence, began to encircle his heart.
sentences.cn: 皈依上帝, 信赖上天的保佑这种念头开始萦绕在他心头.

sentences.en: All things subject to divine providence are ruled and measured by the eternal law.
sentences.cn: 天地万物,只要隶属于神辖范围,就受永恒法支配和调整.

sentences.en: How far is Pawtucket from Providence?
sentences.cn: 波塔基特离普罗维登斯有多远？

sentences.en: It is tempting Providence to go in that old boat.
sentences.cn: 乘那艘旧船前往是冒大险.

sentences.en: It's tempting Providence to go in that old boat.
sentences.cn: 乘那艘旧船出航真是冒险.

sentences.en: Providence had grown mythical in his thoughts, if not malicious.
sentences.cn: 他头脑中产生了一种奇怪的, 如果不是恶意的深谋远虑.

sentences.en: Providence is always on the side of the Big Battalions.
sentences.cn: 天神总是站在大军一边(上天总是帮助强者).

sentences.en: Providence is nothing if not coquettish.
sentences.cn: 如果天公是不故意捉弄人的,那它就什么也不是了.

sentences.en: Providence was more especially on the side of clever people.
sentences.cn: 上天总是更加偏爱聪明人.

sentences.en: So bound home from Providence alone, I was groaning to myself on the train.
sentences.cn: 我独自从普罗维登斯返回, 不禁在火车上喟然叹息.

sentences.en: The despot claimed to be the chosen instrument of divine providence.
sentences.cn: 专制者声称自己是上天选定的统治工具.

sentences.en: These women regard his death as an act of providence.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女将他的死看成是天意的展现。

sentences.en: To act as you have done is to fly in the face of Providence.
sentences.cn: 照你的所作所为那样去行事,是违背上帝的意志的.

sentences.en: We admired his intellectual providence to acquire vast stores of dry information.
sentences.cn: 我们钦佩他收集大量原始资料的远见卓识.

words.tran_cn: 节俭的；有先见之明的；顾及未来的

trans.tran_cn: 天道，天意，远见，节约，上帝，神
trans.tran_en: Providence is God, or a force that is believed by some people to arrange the things that happen to us
